alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Lower Washington County; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 14 at 1:23PM MDT until August 14 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Utah and Wyoming, including the following areas, in Utah, Bryce Canyon Country, Castle Country, Central Mountains, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Lower Washington County, Sanpete Valley, Sevier Valley, Southern Mountains, Southwest Utah, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Western Uinta Mountains. In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in debris flows on area burn scars and flash flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes, slickrock areas, streams, urban areas, and low-lying flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Lower Washington County; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
